name: Allspice Irish Coffee
preparation:
An Irish Coffee is all about the ingredients. And this one by Mary Chojnacki of the Chicago Athletic Association features amazing coffee, incredible whiskey and a pleasant dash of spice.

Warm a coffee mug with hot water, and discard the water.

Pour the coffee to fill 3/4 of the way up.

Add a spoonful of brown sugar, and add the whiskey.

Slowly top with the heavy whipping cream, and garnish with allspice powder.
